trans-unit.source: You create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties> event to customize how profile property values are validated.
trans-unit.target: Criar um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties>evento para personalizar como os valores de propriedade de perfil são validados.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties> event is raised when profile properties are set for a user.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties>é gerado quando as propriedades de perfil são definidas para um usuário.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties>

trans-unit.source: If any property values fail validation, add them to the collection in the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se quaisquer valores de propriedade falharem na validação, adicioná-los à coleção de <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.SetPropertiesForCurrentUser%2A> method returns the collection in the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A> property so that you can determine which properties failed validation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.SetPropertiesForCurrentUser%2A>método retorna a coleção de <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A>propriedade para que você possa determinar quais propriedades Falha na validação.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.SetPropertiesForCurrentUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection that contains profile properties that have failed validation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção que contém as propriedades de perfil que apresentaram falha de validação.

trans-unit.source: The FailedProperties property contains a collection of the names of the properties that have failed validation.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade FailedProperties contém uma coleção de nomes das propriedades que apresentaram falha de validação.

trans-unit.source: If you create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties> event, you add the names of the properties that fail validation to the collection in the FailedProperties property.
trans-unit.target: Se você criar um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties>evento, você adiciona os nomes das propriedades que falharem na validação para a coleção na propriedade FailedProperties.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.SetPropertiesForCurrentUser%2A> method returns the collection in the FailedProperties property so that you can determine which properties failed validation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.SetPropertiesForCurrentUser%2A>método retorna a coleção na propriedade FailedProperties para que você possa determinar quais propriedades Falha na validação.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.SetPropertiesForCurrentUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: The profile properties that have failed validation.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades de perfil que apresentaram falha de validação.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of names and values of the profile properties to validate.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de nomes e valores de propriedades de perfil para validar.

trans-unit.source: The Properties property returns an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object that contains the names and values of the profile properties to set for the user.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade retorna propriedades um <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>objeto que contém os nomes e valores de propriedades do perfil a ser definido para o usuário.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: If you create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties> event, you can retrieve the properties to validate from the Properties property.
trans-unit.target: Se você criar um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties>eventos, você pode recuperar as propriedades para validar a propriedade Properties.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties>

trans-unit.source: If any values fail validation, add them to the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se quaisquer valores falharem na validação, adicioná-los para o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.SetPropertiesForCurrentUser%2A> method returns the collection in the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A> property so that you can determine which properties failed validation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.SetPropertiesForCurrentUser%2A>método retorna a coleção de <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A>propriedade para que você possa determinar quais propriedades Falha na validação.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.SetPropertiesForCurrentUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: The names and values of the profile properties to validate.
trans-unit.target: Os nomes e valores de propriedades de perfil para validar.
